cause.description:
I am raising money for the Leukemia and Lymphoma Society through Team in Training. Team in Training is the endurance training program for the Society. I will walk a full marathon in June 2009!
Read more (and/or donate) at http://pages.teamintraining.org/coh/anchor09/ltaylorv6b
1. To provide money for research
2. Patient and family support
3. Community education
cause.mission: Raise funds to cure blood cancers
cause.name: Leslie Taylor's Team in Training Page
